gene_chemical.confers_resistance_to: Gene/protein mediates resistance to chemical/drug with specified mechanism and context (intrinsic/acquired, cancer type, fold-change)
gene_chemical.sensitizes_to: Gene/protein increases vulnerability to chemical/drug (include biomarker status if validated)
gene_chemical.predicts_response_to: Gene status predicts treatment response (specify: FDA-approved/investigational biomarker)

mutation_chemical.sensitizes_to: Specific mutation creates vulnerability to chemical/drug (e.g., BRCA1/2 mutations → PARP inhibitor sensitivity)
mutation_chemical.confers_resistance_to: Specific mutation causes drug resistance (e.g., EGFR T790M → gefitinib resistance)
mutation_chemical.predicts_response_to: Mutation status predicts drug response in clinical setting

gene_disease.prognostic_biomarker_in: Gene predicts outcome in specific cancer subtype (specify: ER+, TNBC, HER2+, validation level)
gene_disease.predictive_biomarker_for: Gene predicts treatment response in cancer subtype (FDA-approved/investigational)
gene_disease.driver_in: Gene drives oncogenesis in specific cancer subtype
gene_disease.tumor_suppressor_in: Gene suppresses tumorigenesis in specific cancer subtype

gene_phenotype.upregulated_in_resistance: Gene upregulated in resistance to specific drug (specify: fold-change, p-value, cell lines tested, acquired vs intrinsic)
gene_phenotype.downregulated_in_resistance: Gene downregulated in resistance to specific drug (specify: fold-change, p-value, cell lines tested)
gene_phenotype.correlates_with_survival: Gene expression correlates with overall/progression-free survival (hazard ratio, p-value)

chemical_chemical.synergizes_with: Chemicals show synergistic effect (combination index <1, specific cancer type/model)
chemical_chemical.overcomes_resistance_with: Chemical combination overcomes resistance to monotherapy
chemical_chemical.sequential_therapy_after: Chemical B effective after progression on Chemical A

gene_gene.physically_interacts_with: Protein-protein interaction (specify: method of detection, binding affinity if known)
gene_gene.co_expressed_with: Genes show correlated expression across samples (correlation coefficient, context)
gene_gene.synthetic_lethal_with: Combined inhibition is lethal in specific cancer context

gene_pathway.activates: Gene activates pathway (specify: direct/indirect, cancer type where observed)
gene_pathway.is_essential_for: Gene required for pathway function in specific context
gene_pathway.bypasses: Gene activation bypasses inhibition of another pathway (resistance mechanism)

chemical_disease.approved_for: FDA/EMA approved for cancer subtype (specify: line of therapy, combination/monotherapy)
chemical_disease.in_trials_for: In clinical trials (specify: phase I/II/III, NCT number if available)
chemical_disease.resistance_emerges_in: Resistance commonly emerges (specify: median time to resistance, frequency)

chemical_pathway.targets: Chemical targets multiple nodes in pathway

model_finding.observed_in_cell_line: Finding observed in specific cell line (specify: drug concentration, time point)
model_finding.observed_in_pdx: Finding observed in patient-derived xenograft model
model_finding.observed_in_patient: Finding observed in patient samples (sample size, cancer subtype)
model_finding.consistent_across_models: Finding reproducible across multiple model systems
